author: hwright
msg: Fix the JavaHL bindings after r1095195.
(propertySet): Change the single path argument to a Targets reference.
(propertySet): Accept a Targets reference, and use that to call the
and create the Targets object for use down the stack.
(propertySet): Accept a Set of Strings for the paths.

author: rhuijben
msg: Bump our working copy format version to 28 and fixup the remaining MD5
references in the NODES table to SHA1. (This also fixes the reference counts)
On any working copy checked out in +- the last half year (and probably longer)
this only bumps the working copy format number.
(STMT_UPGRADE_TO_28): Add the bump to format 28 query.
(svn_wc__db_pristine_read): Revert r1095194, which reverted some parts of

author: sf
msg: The pre_config hook should return int, not apr_status_t.
